description: This file contains the main front-end React component for a Tic-Tac-Toe game, including game logic, UI rendering, styling, and state management.

methods.name: getEmptyBoard
methods.description: Creates and returns an empty 3x3 game board.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner or a draw on the current board.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: Main React component implementing the game UI and logic.
